description:
The office of Brazil’s Solicitor General filed a legal action in the Superior Court of Justice (Brazil’s second-highest judicial body) on Tuesday calling for the immediate return to work of public servants from environmental protection agency Ibama and the Chico Mendes Institute for Biodiversity Conservation (ICMBio), currently on strike. According to news website Poder360, the […]

The post Solicitor General calls for end to “illegal” environment workers’ strike appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Solicitor General calls for end to “illegal” environment workers’ strike

description:
Minas Gerais Governor Romeu Zema ordered the end of the state's dengue epidemic, bringing an end to a public health emergency

The post Minas Gerais declares end of dengue epidemic appeared first on The Brazilian Report.
title: Minas Gerais declares end of dengue epidemic
